facebook.title: Doubts over heart stem-cell therapy
facebook.summary: Bad science is finally being scrutinized.  We have been unable to reproduce some of the findings referenced in this article despite the fact that the idea itself has advanced to clinical studies.  Science misconduct and the practice of "bad science" is act

New study:

No evidence to support the value of heart stem-cell therapy. Study suggests that funding of basic research must continue, and that stem-cell therapy in heart disease has not yet proven to work.

Details:
http://www.nature.com/news/doubts-over-h

wikipedia.title: Cellular cardiomyoplasty
